actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 101-490.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 913.
Passed Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: An Act to expand the boundaries of the Pecos National Historical Park".
short_title: Pecos National Historical Park Expansion Act of 1990

summary.text: Pecos National Historical Park Expansion Act of 1990 - Modifies the boundaries of the Pecos National Historical Park, New Mexico, to include the Glorieta Unit to preserve and interpret the historic Civil War battlefield area. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Glorieta National Battlefield Establishment Act of 1990
Pecos National Historical Park Expansion Act of 1990
A bill to establish the Glorieta National Battlefield in the State of New Mexico.
An Act to expand the boundaries of the Pecos National Historical Park".
